message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MA. 

This paper deals with the problem of managing the freshness of information updates sent from a source node to a destination via a channel. It involves the optimization of a metric for data freshness at the destination, which is the age-of-information. This problem is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including information theory (cs.IT), networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), systems and control (cs.SY), machine learning (cs.LG), and multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
